name: Abra
trivia: Using its psychic power is such a strain on its brain that it needs to sleep for 18 hours a day.

name: Eevee
trivia: Thanks to its unstable genetic makeup, this special Pok√©mon conceals many different possible evolutions.

name: Vaporeon
trivia: Its cell composition is similar to water molecules. As a result, it cant be seen when it melts away into water.

name: Jolteon
trivia: By storing electricity in its body, it can shoot its bristlelike fur like a barrage of missiles.

name: Flareon
trivia: Inhaled air is carried to its flame sac, heated, and exhaled as fire that reaches over 3,000 degrees F.
